Free Screenshot Capture & Annotation Tool 

Easy-to-use extension for taking screenshots and adding annotations to them. Visualize, annotate, and share screenshots with your team members in a few clicks!

ğŸ”Are you a Jira user and want more features?

Try TaskCompose for Jira Cloud. It's a simple and functional tool for visualizing bug reports, JPD ideas, or regular Jira issues. Send visual feedback from any Chrome tab directly to Jira without distracting from your workflows.
